column4: im having an issue mounting a windows share in 9.10. i've tried mounting as a cifs file system and a smbfs and both come back saying wrong fs type
Do you have samba installed? Does /sbin/mount.cifs exist?
Then install it. Also, window managers don't use smb/cifs/samba, they don't access any files.
Dolphin probably uses its own SMB/CIFS implementation... kio something.
